summary: Soon, DOD will decide when it can officially end development and begin full production of the F-35. However, we testified that DOD still hasn't fully addressed issues we've raised in the past, like supply chain problems. In addition, delays in developing the aircraft simulator have, again, delayed testing and the production decision. Also, while DOD has had cost increases and schedule delays in the F-35...
title: F-35 Joint Strike Fighter: Cost and Schedule Risks in Modernization Program Echo Long-Standing Challenges
